bioSection.bioDescription: I’m a third-year Computer Science student at Champlain College, focused on full stack development, IT, and cybersecurity. I’m passionate about working in teams, which I’ve integrated through playing basketball and working in multiple group projects. I’m ambitious about personal growth and have strong integrity, always ensuring my work is done with care and accountability.

about.title: About
about.description: Welcome to my portfolio! This full-stack monolithic application is built with Spring Boot and Java on the backend, React with TypeScript on the frontend, MongoDB as the database, Docker for the container, Auth0 for authentication, and DigitalOcean for deployment. I hope you enjoyed exploring it and got to learn a bit about me!

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.description: If you have any questions or feedback, feel free to reach out to me.
